title: Client crashing often
body: the last few days ill log on and go to play a aram and everything will be normal ill join the match than it will let me join lobby and show me my champ but i cannot change anything (runes/masterys/sums) and the client crashs right at the last second as the matchvis about to start and i get a 15min leave buster

replies.body: Best to put this in the support section so a wrenchmen or rioter will be more likely to see it next time
